topic.title: How to Omit the Front Page, TOC, Glossary, Index for a Plain DITA Map

body.p: For a plain DITA map, there are no elements that allow you to control if and where to place the generated content such as the title page, table of contents, list of tables, glossary, or index. For the most common use-case, when you want to hide them all and just keep the content, you can use the transformation parameter hide.frontpage.toc.index.glossary. See: .
